author: buscob
msg: Removed uiLabelDecorators. This is a pattern that should not be used. It does not really help but creates dependences instead.

author: buscob
msg: Generally xxxxUiLabelDecorator should not be used. Having a decorator that only adds UiLabel resources creates unnecessary screen dependences.

author: buscob
msg: Removed PortalPageScreen and showPortalPage.ftl since they have been replaced by include-portal-page widget.

author: buscob
msg: The retrievePortletAttributes.groovy is not needed any more since it is now embedded in the include-portal-page widget.

author: buscob
msg: Portlets attributes are now put directly in the context and not in the attributeMap.
